PresentationColumn.name: # of Cash Payments
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric counts the number of cash donations recieved.

PresentationColumn.name: # of COG Orders
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric counts the # of COG Orders (count orders.type = 'Any Covenanted Payment', 'Direct Debit', 'Standing Order')

PresentationColumn.name: 12 Month Cash Income
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric sums all of the donations that have been made as part of a COG order

PresentationColumn.name: 12 Month COG Income
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric sums all of the donations that have been made as part of a COG order

PresentationColumn.name: 12 Month COG Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates and sums estimated COG income for the next 12 months based on the frequency and frequency amount. (IF order.type = 'Any Covenanted Payment', 'Direct Debit', 'Standing Order' then 12 month value)

PresentationColumn.name: Financial Year Cash Income
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric sums all of the donations that have been made as part of a COG order

PresentationColumn.name: Financial Year COG Income
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric sums all of the donations that have been made as part of a COG order

PresentationColumn.name: Total 5 Year Cash Income
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric sums all of the donations that have been made as part of a COG order

PresentationColumn.name: Total 5 Year COG Income
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric sums all of the donations that have been made as part of a COG order

PresentationColumn.name: Value Cash Payments
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric sums the value of cash donations made.
